get_mentions.title: Get Mentions
get_mentions.description: Retrieves tweets that mention the authenticated user from the past 24 hours. Supports pagination and includes detailed tweet metadata like media attachments, referenced tweets, and author information.

post_tweet.title: Post Tweet
post_tweet.description: Publishes tweets with media attachments, thread support, and content moderation checks

reply_tweet.title: Reply Tweet
reply_tweet.description: Constructs contextual replies to tweets with mention handling and conversation threading

get_timeline.title: Get Timeline
get_timeline.description:
Fetches user's home timeline with recent tweets.
Supports pagination for historical data access.
Filters sensitive content and implements rate limiting.

follow_user.title: Follow User
follow_user.description: Initiates following of Twitter accounts with rate limit handling and anti-spam safeguards

like_tweet.title: Like Tweet
like_tweet.description: Records tweet engagements with rate limiting and duplicate prevention

retweet.title: Retweet
retweet.description: Shares tweets with attribution tracking and duplicate prevention mechanisms

search_tweets.title: Search Tweets
search_tweets.description: Executes advanced Twitter searches with keyword filters, date ranges, and engagement thresholds

states.description: States for each Twitter skill (disabled, public, or private)
